item.title: Welcome!
item.author: jour4life@gmail.com (Carlos Valenzuela)
item.description: Welcome to my blog! I am a demographer who loves working with data and emerging data science tools. I decided to start this blog for a couple of reasons. The first is for me to document social science topics, statistical techniques, and data science tools I am interested in. The second reason is to help people like me learn about the potential and utility of data and techniques available without having to start from scratch.
